items.sentence: I might have to come home late. In that case, I'll phone you.
If you hadn't been so brave, you'd probably have been killed.
I'm sorry that I haven't written to you for such a long time.
I'm really happy because I won 10,000 yen at the horse races.
The teacher made Tom sit in the corner because he misbehaved.
I wonder if Tom noticed Mary sitting in the back of the room.
Tom wasn't the only one who was asleep. Mary was asleep, too.
I thought that Tom and Mary were supposed to be in Australia.
I thought that you said Tom didn't live in Australia anymore.
I think that we shouldn't let Tom go to Australia by himself.
